channel.title: Greedy on Brey Laude
channel.description: Recent content in Greedy on Brey Laude

item.title: Kruskal Greedy algorithm for Minimum spanning tree
item.description: The code that follows was written before. To do it, I created a straightforward linked list + insert using a queued linked list and then sorting it was my original plan, but it proved to be too complicated. Simply insert the sort so that the tail is very slight. It serves no purpose and, when used in the tree list, appears more NC. Actually, it is better to use heap or qsort after all input has been received, and to dynamically allocate enough space based on the input n.
